message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this excellent product. Given its features and value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident you'll find this a worthwhile investment.
Alice, $20,000 is way above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for this product. Let me know if you're interested.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your position, $20,000 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept. Could you consider meeting me halfway at $15,000?
